  • Package com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.security.model

    • Class com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.security.model.UserDetailsImpl extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • hasPermission
          boolean hasPermission
          Whether the user has permission (true) or not (false) to use the system. Can be revoked by an admin user if there is suspicious activity, thereby indirectly invalidating any jwt token connected to the user.
        • user
          User user
          User object including user account details such as user id, email etc.
